trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04301_000010_BAGGAMONAN<tab>Long have I waited for this moment, Garlean swine!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04301_000011_BAGGAMONAN<tab>Come! The blood of my fallen brothers feeds my hate!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04301_000020_BAGGAMONAN<tab>You may have escaped me in this life, but I...I shall be waiting in the next!
